summary: This header file extends the Unix OS header for the BS2000 operating system. It defines the platform as 'BS2000' and declares a platform-specific fork function that accepts a user parameter.

logs.message_template: N/A - Implementation not available in this file
logs.reason: The os_fork function might log errors or information messages in its implementation when forking processes under specific user contexts
logs.resolution: Issues would likely relate to permission problems or resource limitations when trying to fork processes. Check user permissions and system resource availability.
